page.title: 10LEISURE ACTIVITIES IN 1985
page.content: We did a survey of Leisure Activities in Symington and this is what we found 1. 11 people watched 4 hours of television per day: 10 watched for 3: 1 for only 1 hour: 3 for more than 5: 3 for 2 hours: 5 person watched for 5 hours. 2. The most popular type of T.V. programme was films,next came comedy, then documentaries and series,cartoons were least popular. 3.17 people would rather join in sports themselves and 13 would rather watch their sport on T.V. 4. That 8 people went to a public house more than 5 times a week,1 went 5 times,7 went 4 times,5 people went once,3 people went 4 times and 2 people never went at all. 5.18 people were members of a leisure club and 12 were not.
